title: Report player
body: Report player, he is banning jungler's champion at selection as well as taking smite to smite jungle's start red then walk to everylane intentionally feeding as well as taking cs. I check his match history and 20games 18 lost 100% trolling . how do these people still not getting ban yet riot ? Wake up, I lostmy game and my friends lost his promo. This is truly unfair!!!

replies.body: Bro, you cant name and shame, its in the t &c's they gunna get rid of this post... Even though your probably right about it all, it cant be done through here, just send a support ticket to riot claiming this and provide as much proof as you can. Nothing will get done through here. Only your post disappearing.. You need to put the effort in to get these players done though. It just takes a little more effort then posting on here. If everyone does this it will make the tolling less.
